name: SeattleMamaDocMessage
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pediatrician Dr. Wendy Sue Swanson, Chief of Digital Innovation and author of the Seattle Mama Doc Blog uses her voice to translate science to the public. 

This flash briefing will be updated weekly and highlight current events, what’s new in pediatrics, inspiration, resources she loves and lessons she's learned throughout her career.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
